# FilmMeter - Professional iOS Light Meter for Film Photography

> FilmMeter is a professional-grade light meter app for iPhone that combines cutting-edge machine learning with the timeless art of film photography.

## About FilmMeter

FilmMeter is an iOS application designed for film photographers who demand precision. It uses iPhone's advanced camera sensors to provide accurate exposure readings calibrated specifically for film characteristics. All processing happens locally on-device using custom-trained CoreML models.

## Key Features

### Metering & Exposure
- **Precision Metering**: Real-time exposure measurement with 1/3, 1/2, and full stop increments
- **Intelligent Scene Detection**: Custom-trained ML model with histogram analysis for automatic exposure compensation
- **Reciprocity Compensation**: Automatic long exposure correction based on each film stock's reciprocity failure characteristics

### Focus & Distance
- **LiDAR Integration**: Distance measurement for depth of field calculations (iPhone 12 Pro+)
- **Rangefinder Focus**: Classic split-image focusing experience inspired by Leica rangefinders
- **Depth of Field Scale**: Visual DOF calculator with format-specific circle of confusion

### Film Management
- **Film Stock Database**: 21 built-in film stocks including Portra 400/160/800, Gold 200, CineStill 800T, Phoenix 200, Ektar 100, HP5+, Velvia 50, and more
- **Film Roll Management**: Track rolls, exposures, and film inventory with photography notes
- **Film Counter**: Rollei/Leica-style frame counter for 135 and 120 formats
- **Medium Format Support**: Full 120 format support with 6x4.5, 6x6, 6x7, 6x9 configurations

### Data & Export
- **Metering History**: Session records with location data and photo attachments
- **CSV Export**: Export complete metering history with full metadata

## Feature Pages

- Light Metering: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/features/light-metering/
  Precision light meter using iPhone camera sensors. Real-time exposure with 1/3, 1/2, full stop increments. Point and average metering modes. 测光表 曝光计算

- LiDAR Rangefinder: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/features/lidar-rangefinder/
  iPhone LiDAR distance measurement for film photography. ARKit-powered rangefinder with Leica-style UI. 测距 对焦距离 LiDAR

- Depth of Field Calculator: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/features/depth-of-field/
  Format-aware DOF calculator for 35mm and 120 medium format. Hyperfocal distance, circle of confusion. 景深计算器 超焦距

- AI Scene Detection: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/features/scene-detection/
  Hybrid histogram + Places365 ML scene recognition. Auto EV compensation, fully offline CoreML. 场景识别 AI测光

- Film Roll Management: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/features/film-roll-management/
  Photography notes and film roll tracking. Exposure records, GPS, CSV export. 摄影笔记 胶卷管理

- Medium Format Support: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/features/medium-format/
  120 film format: 6x4.5, 6x6, 6x7, 6x9, 6x17. Frame counter and DOF for medium format. 中画幅 120胶卷

## Photography Guides

- Reciprocity Failure Guide: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/guides/reciprocity/
  Complete guide to reciprocity failure compensation for film photography. Formula method (Tc=Tm^P) and lookup tables for 21 film stocks. 倒易率 长曝光补偿

- Exposure Triangle Guide: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/guides/exposure-triangle/
  Aperture, shutter speed, and ISO relationship explained for film photographers. Film vs digital ISO differences. 曝光三角 光圈 快门 ISO

## Film Stock Database

Complete database of 21 film stocks with specifications, reciprocity data, and characteristics:
https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/

### Color Negative Films
- Kodak Portra 400: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-portra-400/
- Kodak Portra 160: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-portra-160/
- Kodak Portra 800: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-portra-800/
- Kodak Gold 200: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-gold-200/
- Kodak ColorPlus 200: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-colorplus-200/
- Kodak UltraMax 400: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-ultramax-400/
- Kodak Ektar 100: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-ektar-100/
- Fujifilm Superia X-TRA 400: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/fujifilm-superia-400/
- CineStill 800T: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/cinestill-800t/
- Harman Phoenix 200: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/harman-phoenix-200/
- LeKai C200: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/lekai-c200/
- Kodak Vision3 250D (5207): https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-5207-250d/
- Kodak Vision3 500T (5219): https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-5219-500t/

### Black & White Films
- Ilford HP5 Plus 400: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/ilford-hp5-plus/
- Ilford Delta 400: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/ilford-delta-400/
- Ilford Delta 100: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/ilford-delta-100/

### Reversal / Slide Films
- Fujifilm Velvia 50: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/fujifilm-velvia-50/
- Fujifilm Velvia 100F: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/fujifilm-velvia-100f/
- Fujifilm Provia 100F: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/fujifilm-provia-100f/
- Kodak Ektachrome E100: https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-ektachrome-e100/
- Kodak Ektachrome 100D (5294): https://vurtnec.github.io/filmmeter-website/film-stocks/kodak-5294-100d/

## Technical Requirements

- iOS 15.0 or later
- iPhone 12 Pro or later recommended for LiDAR features
- Camera access required
- Location services optional
- Approximately 50MB storage

## Core Technologies

- AVFoundation for professional camera sensor access
- ARKit & LiDAR for precise distance measurement
- CoreML & Vision for on-device scene recognition
- SwiftUI for native iOS interface
- SwiftData for local data persistence

## Privacy

FilmMeter processes all data locally on your device. No personal information, photos, or metering data is collected or transmitted to external servers. The custom-trained ML model runs entirely on-device using Apple's CoreML framework.

## Design Philosophy

FilmMeter embraces the aesthetic and principles of traditional darkroom photography with a minimalist red-black-white color scheme. The interface follows Apple's Human Interface Guidelines while incorporating the tactile, deliberate nature of film photography.
